ygData.subject: FAO Zardoz.  A response from Itan the Whistler
ygData.msgSnippet: Zardoz you weak minded fool! I accept without arguement that High Elves have been around a while, but then, so have the Giants.  Age is no guarantee of
ygData.messageBody:
Zardoz you weak minded fool!

I accept without arguement that High Elves have been around a while, but
then, so have the Giants. Age is no guarantee of intellect. Face it Elf,
Erud and all his followers have perfected the art of magic to a degree that
you can simply never achieve.

We are more intelligent than you, get over it.

It is good to see, however, that even less intelligent people like yourself
can see the necros for what they are. They should all be rounded up and
burned in the eternal fire of Solusek's wrath. Perhaps you would like to
help gather wood for the pyre?

Enough idle chatter, I have work to be done.

Your Superior,

Itan the Whistler.


OOC: I'll add you to my friends list and hope are paths cross at some point.
